biotools.summary: ParentChecker is a user-friendly tool that uses the segregation patterns of progeny to infer missing genotype information of parent lines that have been used to construct mapping populations. It can also be used to automate correction of linkage phase errors in genotypic data that is in ABH format.

bioschemas.name: ParentChecker
